comments:
JVESMOKE01

After setting the icon property either using the icon editor or from the source,
the property sheet stops acting normally.  If you select another bean and return
to the bean with the icon, the property sheet doesn't show all the properties
for the bean.

These are the errors that show in the .log:

Rich,
This problem is from when we converted over to JavaAllocation and the image 
icon was not able to return a java initialization string. There's a TODO in 
several of the classes related to this in which the code was commented out 
until we could figure it out. So basically this function doesn't work for any 
bean that has some type of icon or image icon as a property.

Please look it over and let me know how I should proceed in fixing this bug. It 
looks like whatever change is needed can be applied to the other classes as 
well.

Here's a list of classes that need to be fixed:
ImageCellEditor
ImageIconCellEditor
ImageIconLabelProvider
ImageLabelProvider
ImageProxyAdapter
Fixed and released into HEAD... should be in latest integration build... I20040603
1.0M2 is out, so these are now closed in M2.
